title: The "Indrani" Polki Diamond & Emerald Cascade Haaram
features: A stunning contemporary haaram featuring a graduated cascade design. Each Polki diamond is individually bezel-set and framed by a halo of smaller brilliant-cut diamonds for maximum sparkle. Lush green emerald drops, teardrop-shaped (Ashru bindu), add a vibrant contrast and graceful movement. The setting is meticulously crafted with a closed-back design to amplify the brilliance of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: 50th anniversary). Its modern take on a traditional design makes it suitable for both formal and semi-formal events.
description: This "Indrani" Haaram showcases the timeless elegance of Polki diamonds with a contemporary design twist. The high-quality Polki diamonds ensure exceptional brilliance, while the emerald drops add a touch of regal charm. It's a statement piece that embodies both tradition and modernity. Crafted with the highest standards of Hyderabadi craftsmanship, this haaram is designed to be a treasured heirloom.
